question.text: Select the correct description regarding the chemical messengers released by glands found on top of kidney.

options.text: Aldosterone stimulates the reabsorption of  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  and water from the renal tubules.
Glucocorticoids promote cellular uptake and utilisation of amino acids.
Androgens helps in the maintenance of body fluid volume and osmotic pressure only.

solution.text: I. Aldosterone stimulates the reabsorption of  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="bold">N</mi><mi mathvariant="bold">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> and water from renal tubules.III. Glucocorticoids inhibit cellular uptake and utilisation of amino acids.IV. Aldosterone helps in the maintenance of body fluid volume, electrolytes, osmotic pressure and blood pressure.
